html:
The skies are silent
Clouds slowly float
There is no rain
Itâ€™s good to have a walk
A walk around the place
Full of houses
Stores
Cars traveling on roads
Fire is being passed
Gestuere of good relations
Carry intentions
And hope
Also a grasshopper shown up
Came from his lawn
It'll probably be absorbed
By space of the hospital
title: Grashopper
